head.title: Tagix - Type-Safe State Management
head.description: Strictly typed state management powered by Tagged Unions, Inferred Actions, and exhaustive Pattern Matching.

hero.tagline: Strictly typed state management powered by Tagged Unions, Inferred Actions, and exhaustive Pattern Matching.

features.title: Type Safety by Design
features.subtitle: Built to leverage TypeScript's control flow analysis for robust application state

taggedUnions.title: Tagged Unions
taggedUnions.description: Define state as mathematically exhaustive discriminated unions. Impossible states become compile-time errors.

inferredActions.title: Inferred Actions
inferredActions.description: Declare actions with automatic type inference. The compiler derives payload and reducer types directly from your implementation.

patternMatching.title: Pattern Matching
patternMatching.description: Enforce handling of all state variants. TypeScript's control flow analysis guarantees your application logic is exhaustive.

head.title: API Reference | Tagix
head.description: Complete API reference for Tagix. Explore functions, types, and utilities for type-safe state management.

hero.title: API Reference
hero.tagline: Complete generated documentation for the Tagix library actions, types, and interfaces.
